lead_paragraph: Messi, the Barcelona striker, is expected to play in Wednesday’s King’s Cup semi-final against Valencia despite missing training on Monday to have tests on his kidneys, the La Liga club said.

headline.print_headline: Messi Undergoes Tests for Kidney Problems
headline.main: Lionel Messi Undergoes Tests for Kidney Problems

snippet: Messi, the Barcelona striker, is expected to play in Wednesday’s King’s Cup semi-final against Valencia despite missing training on Monday to have tests on his kidneys, the La Liga club said....
